Vision is a chrome extension offering advanced protection against malicious sites, unwanted downloads, social engineering, and more.

Protection Score
Measures online scam protection, helping users monitor and improve their online security.

Trust Worthiness
Provides a website trust score based on factors like domain age, SSL certificate, and user reviews to assess website safety.

Expanded Website Analysis
Displays additional site information, including age and trust score factors, assisting users in making informed browsing decisions.
